Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People can expect an improvement in the forecasts for real wage growth with income expected to outpace inflation in the coming years according to the Federal Government's budget forecast. The budget is also predicted to offer more job opportunities and better wages in the future. Additionally the recent review of Australia's public service workforce has sparked controversy with opposition promising to rebuild the public servant workforce if elected. However it remains to be seen how the government will address these concerns in the upcoming budget announcement.
